keyer.title: HTTP Key
keyer.description: Makes request to a URL and hashes the HTML.
keyer.inputhelp: Number of inputs: 2 Input 1: The URL ex) https://somesite.com/index.html Input 2: User Agent (https://developers.whatismybrowser.com/useragents/explore/) ex) Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko
